item.title: Upgrading blog to hugo
item.description: I always wanted to try out Hugo but never got a chance to do it. I spent some time today and migrated my Octopress blog to Hugo. So far, I am liking it. I didn’t find a theme which matches my expectations, but the default one and few others are good enough to get started.
